alert.note: Alert for Marion (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued April 16 at 7:51PM CDT until April 20 at 4:00PM CDT by NWS Jackson
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Mississippi... Pearl River Near Monticello affecting Lawrence County. Pearl River Near Rockport affecting Copiah and Simpson Counties. Pearl River Near Columbia affecting Marion County. For the Lower Pearl River ...including D`lo, Rockport, Monticello, Columbia...Minor flooding is forecast. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT FROM MONDAY AFTERNOON TO THURSDAY AFTERNOON... * WHAT...Minor flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Pearl River Near Columbia. * WHEN...From Monday afternoon to Thursday afternoon. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:15 PM CDT Sunday the stage was 16.4 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise above flood stage tomorrow afternoon to a crest of 17.5 feet early Tuesday afternoon. - Flood stage is 17.0 feet. && Fld Observed Forecasts (7 pm CDT) Location Stg Stg Day/Time Mon Tue Wed Pearl River Columbia 17.0 16.4 Sun 7 pm CDT 17.1 17.5 17.1 &&
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Forecast includes rainfall on the ground and 24 hours of additional rainfall. Additional information is available at www.water.weather.gov/ahps2/index.php?wfo=JAN The next statement will be issued Monday morning at 800 AM CDT.
